title: Ticket #1627: Remove GCB
description:
We believe that GCB has been almost entirely replaced by CCB. GCB has always been more fragile and less secure. Keeping it in Condor adds complexity to configuration, debugging, enhancement, and maintenance. So:

  1. Verify that our users are happy with CCB instead of GCB.
  2. If some users require it, add support for NATs on both sides to CCB.
  3. Remove GCB from Condor.
remarks:
2011-Nov-09 16:52:16 by adesmet:
GCB is dead. But, bits of dead code linger in some places. Find and destroy them.

2011-Nov-09 16:52:57 by adesmet:
Dupe: #1924: Remove GCB (The work removing GCB was done on that ticket)
